branding.title: Just Enough Music Theory For Hawaiian Musicians
branding.tagline: Essential music theory for Hawaiian music

navigation.introduction: Greetings and welcome to "Just Enough Music Theory for Hawaiian Musicians". You will find resources and lessons for the most essential elements of music theory that are found in Hawaiian music. This project is in a developmental stage at the moment, so please bear with us!

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the interface

primaryInstrument.title: Primary Instrument
primaryInstrument.description: Select your main instrument for quick access

branding.title: Ke Kālaikuhi e Lawa Ai Ka Mea Ho'okani Pila a Hīmeni Hawai'i
branding.tagline: Nā kālaikuhi puolo e pono ai ka mea ho'okani pila Hawai'i

navigation.chooseInstrument: E Koho i Kāu Pila Ho'okani
navigation.introduction: Welina ke aloha iā kākou, a e komo mai i "Nā Kālaikuhi Puolo e Lawa ai Ka Mea Ho'okani Pila a Hīmeni Hawai'i". E 'ike 'ia i loko nei nā kumu waiwai a ha'awina waiwai loa e pili ana i nā kumumea kālaikuhi puolo e lohe 'ia i loko o ka puolo Hawai'i. Aia nō kēia papahana ma ka kona wā ho'omohala, no laila, e ho'omanawanui mai!

language.title: ʻŌlelo
language.description: Koho i kāu ʻōlelo makemake no ka ʻaoʻao

primaryInstrument.title: Pila Kani Nui
primaryInstrument.description: Wae i kāu pila kani nui no ka hiki wikiwiki

branding.title: He Mātauranga Puoro nā Kaiako Puoro Māori
branding.tagline: Ngā mātauranga puoro matua mō te puoro Māori

navigation.introduction: Kia ora, nau mai ki "He Mātauranga Puoro nā Kaiako Puoro Māori". Ka kitea e koe ngā rauemi me ngā akoranga mō ngā mea matua o te mātauranga puoro o te puoro Māori. He kaupapa whakatipu tonu tēnei, nō reira kia manawanui!

content.contentComingSoon: He roa ai ka tae mai...

language.title: Reo
language.description: Kōwhiria tō reo pai mō te mata

primaryInstrument.title: Taonga Puoro Matua
primaryInstrument.description: Kōwhiria tō taonga puoro matua mō te tere atu

branding.title: Te Mau Mata'ira'a Hīmene nō te Feia Hīmene Tahiti
branding.tagline: Te mau mata'ira'a hīmene matamua no te hīmene Tahiti

navigation.introduction: Ia ora na, e maeva mai i "Te Mau Mata'ira'a Hīmene nō te Feia Hīmene Tahiti". E 'ite ra 'outou i te mau tīfau ma te mau ha'api'ira'a no te mau mea rahi roa o te mata'ira'a hīmene i loto i te hīmene Tahiti. Te mea nei teie hōho'a, no reira e fa'ari'i!

language.title: Reo
language.description: Hiti i tā 'oe reo manao no te mata

primaryInstrument.title: Hōho'a Matamua
primaryInstrument.description: Hiti i tā 'oe hōho'a matamua no te tere

branding.title: Théorie Musicale Essentielle pour Musiciens Hawaïens
branding.tagline: Théorie musicale essentielle pour la musique hawaïenne

navigation.introduction: Bonjour et bienvenue dans "Théorie Musicale Essentielle pour Musiciens Hawaïens". Vous trouverez ici des ressources et des leçons sur les éléments essentiels de la théorie musicale présents dans la musique hawaïenne. Ce projet est en cours de développement, merci de votre patience !

branding.title: Teoría Musical Esencial para Músicos Hawaianos
branding.tagline: Teoría musical esencial para la música hawaiana

navigation.introduction: Saludos y bienvenidos a "Teoría Musical Esencial para Músicos Hawaianos". Encontrarás recursos y lecciones sobre los elementos esenciales de la teoría musical presentes en la música hawaiana. Este proyecto está en desarrollo, ¡ten paciencia con nosotros!
